name: H.E.R.O. is Back 2
description:
This game is a homage to H.E.R.O. from John Van Ryzin published by Activision in 1984.

This version contains completely new levels, graphics, and sounds.

Every 5 levels you get a password that allows you not to have to start over every time.

Read the "Instructions.txt" file for gameplay instructions.
